https://tmrev.io/movie/31058-Bitter Rice 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/tWt56ifJym4Uu1tWFsqxAeX6WEL.jpg Francesca and Walter are two-bit criminals in Northern Italy, and, in an effort to avoid the police, Francesca joins a group of women rice workers. She meets the voluptuous peasant rice worker, Silvana, and the soon-to-be-discharged soldier, Marco. Walter follows her to the rice fields, and the four characters become involved in a complex plot involving robbery, love, and murder. Bitter Rice
